pages.title: Cables
pages.text: Cables allow for long-range energy transfer. There are two variants: steel and desh â€“ desh, having a higher transfer rate. When used with a wrench, cables can be configured to extend in directions or to disconnect from nodes in the network.

pages.title: Cable ducts
pages.text: Cables are not solid blocks. As such, they will not seal a structure which prevents oxygen distributors and gravity normalizers from functioning. The cable duct is a full block that works exactly like cables while preventing leaks.
